mapper.select: select distinct sbr.book_id, bi.name from study_book_rate as sbr inner join book_info as bi on (sbr.book_id = bi.id) where sbr.user_id = #{userId} order by sbr.book_id desc

select unit.unitId, ifnull(sbr.state, 0) as state from (select distinct unit as unitId from words where book_id = #{bookId} ) as unit left join study_book_rate as sbr on (sbr.user_id = #{userId} and sbr.book_id = #{bookId} and unit.unitId = sbr.unit_id) order by unit.unitId
select (select max(unit) from words where book_id = #{bookId}) + 1 = (select count(distinct unit_id) from study_book_rate where user_id = #{userId} and book_id = #{bookId})

select MAX(id), book_id, user_id, unit_id, MAX(state) state, MAX(create_time) from study_book_rate where user_id = #{userId} and book_id = #{bookId} and unit_id = #{unitId} group by book_id, user_id, unit_id
